sentences.en: A subservient client would soon face an accumulation of ever - growing pressures.
sentences.cn: 奴颜婢膝的附庸则很快就会导致外来日益增加的种种压力.

sentences.en: All this does not mean that the accumulation of capital is undesirable.
sentences.cn: 这一切并不意味着资本积累是不值得希求的.

sentences.en: Gas may play an important part in the accumulation of iodide in subsurface waters.
sentences.cn: 在地下水碘化物聚集过程中,气体可起重要作用.

sentences.en: Her only interest was the accumulation of money.
In some climax communities, there is slow accumulation of net ecosystem production.
sentences.cn: 某些顶极群落中也存在缓慢积累的净生态系统生产.

sentences.en: It is the intent herein to indicate the accumulation of empirical data.
sentences.cn: 在这里试图指出与累积试验数据有关的问题.

sentences.en: It'seems that not all fat is simply a depot for the accumulation of surplus energy.
sentences.cn: 并非所有脂肪都是剩余能量的积蓄.

sentences.en: Such trilateration is liable to rapid accumulation of azimuth error.
sentences.cn: 这样的三边测量锁的方位误差容易迅速积累.

sentences.en: The capitalists only care about the accumulation of wealth.
The effect of substrate temperature on the accumulation of disorder is substantial.
sentences.cn: 衬底温度对于无序区积累的影响是很显著的.

sentences.en: The funds needed will mainly be drawn from accumulation within the enterprise.
sentences.cn: 所需资金主要取给于企业内部的积累.

sentences.en: The gas accumulation is controlled entirely by stratigraphic parameters.
sentences.cn: 气的聚集完全受地层参数的控制.

sentences.en: The sleeves must cover stems to a point above the greatest expected snow accumulation.
sentences.cn: 套筒必须将预计中积雪最高处以上的茎干包裹着.

sentences.en: They have a yellowish color owing to the accumulation of elastin in the media.
sentences.cn: 因中膜中含有很多弹性纤维所以呈黄色.

sentences.en: Thus, there is a built - in tendency towards the accumulation of sand / mud laminae.
sentences.cn: 因此, 有一种堆积砂泥纹层的内在趋势.

words.tran_cn: 累计的；累积的；积聚而成的
蓄电池；[计] 累加器；积聚者

trans.tran_en: An accumulation of something is a large number of things that have been collected together or acquired over a period of time
